description: Complete system overview detailing the high-level architecture, key components, and their interactions in the URL-to-Markdown conversion system
Detailed documentation of URL extraction, validation, and transformation algorithms, including the retry mechanism and fallback strategies
Comprehensive documentation of the HTML-to-Markdown conversion process, including HTML fetching, content extraction, and transformation pipeline
Documentation of the concurrent processing implementation, including adaptive concurrency based on CPU cores and the URL processing queue management
Detailed mapping of data flow between components, from URL input through processing to final Markdown output, including all transformation stages
